title: AI Hiring in India Projected To Rise by 32% in 2026 With Nearly 3.8 Lakh Roles, Says Foundit Report
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) emerged as the defining hiring force in 2025 in India, with 290,256 AI-linked roles posted last year, a report showed on Tuesday. This momentum is set to accelerate further, with AI hiring projected to grow 32 per cent year-on-year in 2026 to nearly 3.8 lakh roles, said the report by foundit (formerly Monster APAC & ME).

title: UK regulator opens probe into X over sexualised AI imagery
description: Ofcom on Monday launched a formal investigation into Elon Musk's X over its AI chatbot Grok's image creation feature
